name: Kingdom Guardian
description:
KINGDOM GUARDIAN

Simple "plants vs zombies"-like game
NEW GAME - start new campaign
LOAD GAME - continue campaign (all levels are unlocked at the moment)
FREE GAME - try different defenders and tactics
ENCYCLOPEDIA - information about all defenders and attackers

INCLUDES
- simple graphics
- some sounds
- 20 levels
- 19 defenders, 15 attackers
- 15 items and/or spells
- keyboard shortcuts
- bugs :) If you find any please let me know!

Thank you for downloading the game!
